content: PHASES: Phase 0 (wk 1-2): Foundation - repo, types, DB schema, crypto. Phase 1 (wk 3-5): Core ops - WRITE, REVISE, READ end-to-end. Phase 2 (wk 5-7): Entropy engine - integration cost computation. Phase 3 (wk 7-9): Catalog/BROWSE with entropy annotations. Phase 4 (wk 9-11): SHARE/OBSERVE, multi-agent access. Phase 5 (wk 11-13): Validation with real agent exchange. Critical path: 0->1->2->3->5. Phase 4 parallels from Phase 1.
author: founder
